titleStmt.title: A testimony for all the masters of ships and seamen to read over Reprinted the second time, with an addition. By George Fox.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication conjectured by Wing.
"Concerning how the world is called the sea" has caption title on p. 16.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
